Image gallery with captions

JS:
$(function(){
  $('.bxslider').bxSlider({
    mode: 'fade',
    captions: true,
    slideWidth: 400
  });
});

  <li><img src="/assets/images/unsplash-1.jpg" title="The long and winding road"></li>
  <li><img src="/assets/images/unsplash-2.jpg" title="Happy trees"></li>
</ul>
